mapper.select: SELECT b.id id, b.project project, p.name projectName, p.description projectDescription, b.device device, d.name deviceName, d.band deviceBand, d.No deviceNo, d.Model deviceModel, d.description deviceDescription, b.applicant applicant, u.nickname applicantNickname, b.status status, DATE_FORMAT(b.begin_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') beginTime, DATE_FORMAT(b.end_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') endTime, DATE_FORMAT(b.create_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') createTime, DATE_FORMAT(b.update_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') updateTime FROM book_recode b LEFT JOIN project p ON p.id = b.project LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = b.applicant LEFT JOIN device d ON d.id = b.device WHERE b.status != -1 And b.id= #{id} And b.project = #{project} And b.device = #{device} And b.applicant = #{applicant} And b.begin_time<= #{time} And b.end_time>= #{time} ORDER BY b.id LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_recode (project, device, begin_time, end_time,applicant,status) VALUES (#{project}, #{device}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime},#{applicant},#{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE book_recode SET status=-1 WHERE id = #{id}
